name: Swarm of Quippers
condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned, unconscious

actions.name: Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (4d4) piercing damage  or 5 (2d4) piercing damage if the swarm is bloodied. On a hit  the swarm can use a bonus action to make a second bites attack.

special_abilities.name: Swarm
special_abilities.desc: The swarm can occupy another creatures space and move through any opening large enough for a Tiny creature. It can't gain hit points or temporary hit points.
